name: cmdstan

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: CmdStan is the command line interface to Stan.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Cray's MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of
the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: opencl
dependencies.description:
Portable Computing Language (pocl) is an open source implementation of
the OpenCL standard which can be easily adapted for new targets and
devices, both for homogeneous CPU and heterogeneous GPUs/accelerators.

dependent_to.name: r-cmdstanr
dependent_to.description:
R Interface to 'CmdStan'. A lightweight interface to 'Stan' <https://mc-
stan.org>. The 'CmdStanR' interface is an alternative to 'RStan' that
calls the command line interface for compilation and running algorithms
instead of interfacing with C++ via 'Rcpp'. This has many benefits
including always being compatible with the latest version of Stan, fewer
installation errors, fewer unexpected crashes in RStudio, and a more
permissive license.
